page.title: 14RELIGION
page.content: This area is well served by both chapels and churches.The number indicates the greater population of the past and the a more religious community. There are three parishes within the block and their respective churches. All are Church of Wales.There is also a Roman Catholic church and a Salvation Army citadel. The majority of religious buildings are chapels _ten in all:they represent several denominations:_Baptist, Methodist, Congregational and Jehovah's Witness. Many of these Chapels share a minister and in two cases hold services on a rota basis. The chapels are declining in attendance and some are being closed and amalgamated. There is also a chapel and public cemetery.
